title: Not helvetica but...
content:
Used on the latest TASCHEN mag (Spring 2014)  
The "t" is awesome

comments.content: It looks like **[Chalet Book (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122451/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries&ffam=ChaletBook%20-%20Bold&fid=09ecf9ea0f2216241889b9ecc0cbc615&fsize=48&text=Gloire%2C%20puissance%20et%20beaute&wrap=2)** by House Industries
